title: The Battle of the Falkland Islands, Before and After
author: Spencer-Cooper, Henry Edmund Harvey, 1884-1968

quoteFirst: I pulled out my watch. A fickle ray--the merest filtration of moonlight--glimmered on the dial.
quoteLast: ! "Past yin o'clock, and a dark, haary moarnin'." I recalled the bull voice of the watchman as he had called it on the night of our escape from the Castle--its very tones: and this echo of memory seemed to strike and reverberate the hour closing a long day of fate.
title: The Works of Robert Louis Stevenson - Swanston Edition, Vol. 20
author: Stevenson, Robert Louis, 1850-1894; Quiller-Couch, Arthur, 1863-1944 [Contributor]
